sentences.en: A desperate tiredness set in after hours of anxious waiting.
sentences.cn: 数小时的焦急等待之后,整个人变得精疲力竭.

sentences.en: An increasing ratio of mistakes, perhaps induced by tiredness, crept into her game.
sentences.cn: 可能是由于体力不支，她在比赛中的失误越来越多。

sentences.en: Ask yourself...have you put aside enough time for her, to listen to her “blues” of working in the kitchen, her tiredness?
sentences.cn: 扪心自问，你是否曾经抽出过足够的时间陪伴她，听她讲围着灶台转的“伤心事”，讲她也会疲劳？？？

sentences.en: He felt half dead with tiredness.
sentences.cn: 他已经累得半死不活了。

sentences.en: He had to cancel some engagements because of tiredness.
sentences.cn: 他太累了，不得不取消一些约会。

sentences.en: Her arm muscles have knotted with tiredness.
sentences.cn: 她手臂的肌肉由于疲劳而突出出来。

sentences.en: His tiredness caused him to make a regrettable error.
sentences.cn: 他由于疲劳而犯了个令人遗憾的错误.

sentences.en: I incline to [ towards ] tiredness in winter.
I incline to tiredness in winter.
Ignoring feelings of tiredness knocks our body clocks out of kilter.
sentences.cn: 忽视疲劳感会打乱我们的生物钟。

sentences.en: It was then he knew the depth of his tiredness.
sentences.cn: 这时候他才明白自己疲乏到什么程度.

sentences.en: Peppermint leaves are believed to relieve tiredness and nasal stuffiness.
sentences.cn: 据信薄荷叶可以减轻疲劳和鼻塞。

sentences.en: Primrose, stupefied by tiredness, began to wail that she was hungry.
sentences.cn: 普丽姆罗丝累得精神都有些恍惚了，开始哭着说她饿了。

sentences.en: Symptoms are unusual paleness and tiredness.
sentences.cn: 症状是异常的苍白和疲劳.

sentences.en: This deep tiredness makes it hard to imagine how to squeeze out any more energy toward taking care of ourselves.
sentences.cn: 这样深度的疲倦确实让人很难想象怎么才能挤出哪怕一点点精力来照顾我们自己。

sentences.en: Tiredness and despair were etched into his face.
sentences.cn: 疲乏与失望刻在他的脸上.

sentences.en: Tiredness and fever are much more likely to be a sign of flu coming on.
sentences.cn: 疲倦、发烧更有可能是患流感的征兆。

sentences.en: Tiredness is one of the most common symptoms of stress.
sentences.cn: 疲倦是由压力引起的最常见症状之一.

words.tran_cn: 累人的；麻烦的；无聊的；引起疲劳的
不知疲倦地；不屈不挠地
疲倦；对…腻烦（tire的过去分词形式）
厌倦；使劳累（tire的ing形式）；感到疲倦
